Articles.Content: First of all thanks developers and posters alike this game is developing into a classic even before it has been really released. The tutorials here are really helpful to make this game enjoyable so that you don\'t necessarily have to be an astro-physicist to play it (might help though). I first saw this game on a game review show on Australian tv over the xmas holidays so downloaded it and have been hooked ever since. I made my donation a while back so I cant wait to see the full version. If any of you remember the TV show Mork & Mindy, all there is left to say is Nanoo Nanoo!
